<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 127 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Trigger**
Your turn ends and you have a status penalty to your Speed or are [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=81) or [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92).

</column>

---

You flow like water, avoiding all restraints. End one status penalty to your speed, or end one [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=81) or [slowed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) condition affecting you.
